name: Propaganda Identification
description: Techniques for detecting propaganda and misinformation campaigns used in media and politics.

cards.title: Recognizing Propaganda Techniques
cards.description: Identifying the core strategies used in modern propaganda campaigns.
cards.bulletpoints: Analyze emotional appeals, false dilemmas, authority bias, and repetition conditioning

cards.title: Psychological Triggers in Propaganda
cards.description: Understanding how propaganda exploits cognitive biases to influence perception.
cards.bulletpoints: Identify confirmation bias exploitation, groupthink induction, and fear-based persuasion
